english: seem to diminish
chinese: 似乎在缩小
example: Cultural differences seem to diminish as global communication becomes more frequent.

english: cultural elements become a regular part of daily life
chinese: 文化元素成为日常生活的一部分
example: Through globalization, cultural elements from around the world become a regular part of daily life.

english: regardless of their nationality
chinese: 不论他们的国籍
example: People worldwide enjoy similar entertainment regardless of their nationality.

english: a diverse range of foods
chinese: 各种各样的食物
example: Urban areas offer a diverse range of foods from different cultural backgrounds.

english: gather at the same international restaurants
chinese: 聚在同样的国际餐厅
example: Friends gather at the same international restaurants to enjoy global cuisines together.

english: share meals that once seemed exotic
chinese: 分享曾经看似异国风味的食物
example: They share meals that once seemed exotic but now feel familiar and comforting.

english: now a familiar part of our routine
chinese: 现在是我们日常生活中熟悉的一部分
example: Eating sushi has become now a familiar part of our routine in many cities.

english: watch international movies with my peers
chinese: 和我的同伴一起看国际电影
example: I often watch international movies with my peers to explore different cultures.

english: discuss similar themes and emotions
chinese: 讨论相似的主题和情感
example: Viewers discuss similar themes and emotions portrayed in films from various countries.

english: from different backgrounds
chinese: 来自不同背景
example: People from different backgrounds can find common ground through shared cultural experiences.

english: shared experiences
chinese: 共同的经历
example: Shared experiences with global media create bonds between people worldwide.

english: adopt similar tastes and interests
chinese: 采纳了相似的品味和兴趣
example: Young people often adopt similar tastes and interests through social media influences.

english: make us feel more alike despite our different origins
chinese: 尽管我们的出身不同，仍让我们感觉更相似
example: These shared interests make us feel more alike despite our different origins.

english: access information about distinct cultures
chinese: 获取有关不同文化的信息
example: The internet allows easy access to information about distinct cultures worldwide.

english: learn from each other
chinese: 互相学习
example: Cultural exchange programs help people learn from each other's traditions and values.

english: result in a reduction in these differences
chinese: 导致这些差异的减少
example: Increased interaction often results in a reduction in cultural differences over time.

english: limited knowledge about American culture
chinese: 对美国文化的了解有限
example: Previously, people had limited knowledge about American culture in many regions.

english: due to the long distance between our countries
chinese: 由于我们两国之间的长距离
example: Due to the long distance between our countries, cultural exchange was once difficult.

english: their eating habits, clothing styles, and daily routines
chinese: 他们的饮食习惯、穿衣风格和日常作息
example: She was curious about their eating habits, clothing styles, and daily routines.

english: with the advent of the internet
chinese: 随着互联网的到来
example: With the advent of the internet, global cultural exchange accelerated rapidly.

english: access to a wide range of American movies and TV shows
chinese: 接触到各种各样的美国电影和电视节目
example: Streaming services provide access to a wide range of American movies and TV shows.

english: adopt western habits
chinese: 采用了西方的习惯
example: Some individuals adopt western habits after being exposed to foreign media.

english: cultural exchanges have made our lifestyles more similar
chinese: 文化交流使我们的生活方式更加相似
example: Over time, cultural exchanges have made our lifestyles more similar on a global scale.
